signal_description: Retrieve the sum of AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency and AR_ClearedAmountInGlobalCurrency columns from the defaultview-222 table.
llm_output:
{
"signal_description": "Retrieve the sum of AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency and AR_ClearedAmountInGlobalCurrency columns from the defaultview-222 table."
}

The signal_description was constructed by analyzing the SIGNAL query and breaking it down into its component parts.

* The first part of the query is "SELECT SUM("AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency" )", which indicates that we want to retrieve the sum of the "AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency" column from a table.
* The second part of the query is "SUM("AR_ClearedAmountInGlobalCurrency" )", which indicates that we want to retrieve the sum of the "AR_ClearedAmountInGlobalCurrency" column from the same table.
* The final part of the query is "FROM "defaultview-222"", which specifies the table from which we want to retrieve the data.

Based on this analysis, we can construct a human-readable description of the SIGNAL query, which is "Retrieve the sum of AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency and AR_ClearedAmountInGlobalCurrency columns from the defaultview-222 table."

This description explicitly references the table name ("defaultview-222"), the column names ("AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency" and "AR_ClearedAmountInGlobalCurrency"), and the respective values (the sums of the columns).
